headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Lucky Wheel Podium: The Pfister Neon
content: Stop by The Diamond Casino & Resort, grab a drink at the bar, and step up to the Lucky Wheel to win GTA$, RP, clothes, and all manner of mystery prizes. This week on the podium is the battery-powered Pfister Neon, a whisper-quiet electric sports car that answers all your questions about the future with a suggestively raised eyebrow. Behold.
